title: Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls with Governors and Local Officials to Discuss Recovery Act Implementation, 4/14/09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 14, 2009

 



Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls with Governors and Local Officials to Discuss Recovery Act Implementation, 4/14/09




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Vice President  ____________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                              April 14th, 2009  VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN HOSTS CONFERENCE CALLS WITH GOVERNORS AND LOCAL OFFICIALS TO DISCUSS RECOVERY ACT IMPLEMENTATION   Earlier today, the Vice President hosted two conference calls with Governors and Mayors/County Executives from across the country to discuss Recovery Act implementation.   The following elected officials participated:   GOVERNORS  Governor Mitch Daniels (R-IN) Governor Jim Douglas (R-VT) Lt. Governor Jack Dalrymple (R-ND) Governor John Otter (R-ID) Governor Deval Patrick (D-MA)    MAYORS / COUNTY EXECUTIVES  Mayor Karl Dean (D – Nashville, TN) Mayor Darwin Hindman (Columbia, MO) Mayor Mary Hooper (D – Montpelier, VT) Mayor R.T. Rybak (D – Minneapolis, MN) Mayor John Robert Smith (R – Meridian, MS) County Executive Barbara Fiala (D – Broome County, NY) County Supervisor Linda Langston (D – Linn County, IA)
